title: Alejandro Lo Celso
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420084828/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420084828/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Alejandro Lo Celso**

Argentinean type designer, currently living and teaching in Mexico.  
MA from Reading, UK.  
His typeface [Borges](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420084828/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Borges) was awarded the Carter Prize at the [Morisawa Contest](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420084828/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Morisawa%20Contest) 2002.
author: paul d hunt
